graph.original_query: Create a professional one-page dark-themed portfolio website for a photographer using Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css (for scroll-in section reveals and CTA hover transitions), and Splide.js (for a testimonial carousel and horizontally scrolling image gallery); use CDN only (no build tools); apply a sleek black/charcoal base, warm beige/muted orange accents, elegant typography, refined spacing, subtle transitions (no glows/neons); include sticky header with anchor links, hero section with fullscreen image (https://picsum.photos/1600/900?blur=1), category highlight cards (https://picsum.photos/400/600?grayscale), animated counters (clients, projects, years), About (mission, timeline), Gallery or Services grid (6–8 projects), Contact form (name/email/message), and footer with social icons; keep layout responsive and professional, with no lorem ipsum, real readable text, and pure HTML/CSS/JS; use CoderAgent in 9–10 precise updates (meta, header, hero, counters, cards, timeline, gallery, testimonial slider, contact form, layout cleanup), and finally audit spacing, contrast, and visual balance to ensure premium photographer look.

nodes.description: Set up the basic HTML structure, include Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js via CDNs, and create a basic dark theme CSS.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a basic HTML structure for a one-page website. Include Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js via CDNs. Set up a basic dark theme with a black/charcoal base, warm beige/muted orange accents, and elegant typography. Include basic sections: header, hero, category highlight cards, animated counters, about, gallery, contact form, and footer.

nodes.description: Create a sticky header with anchor links to different sections of the page.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T001, create a sticky header with anchor links to the hero section, category highlight cards, animated counters, about section, gallery/services grid, contact form, and footer. Ensure the header is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes.

nodes.description: Design the hero section with a full-screen blurred image from https://picsum.photos/1600/900?blur=1.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T002, design the hero section with a full-screen blurred image from https://picsum.photos/1600/900?blur=1. Add a title and a brief description related to photography. Use Tailwind CSS for styling.

nodes.description: Implement animated counters for clients, projects, and years of experience.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T003, implement animated counters for clients, projects, and years of experience. Use JavaScript to animate the counters on page load. Style the counters to fit the dark theme.

nodes.description: Create category highlight cards using images from https://picsum.photos/400/600?grayscale.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T004, create category highlight cards using images from https://picsum.photos/400/600?grayscale. Add a title and a brief description for each category. Style the cards to fit the dark theme and make them responsive.

nodes.description: Develop the 'About' section with a mission statement and a timeline of the photographer's career.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T005, develop the 'About' section with a mission statement and a timeline of the photographer's career. Use a visually appealing design for the timeline. Style the section to fit the dark theme.

nodes.description: Design a gallery or services grid showcasing 6-8 projects.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T006, design a gallery or services grid showcasing 6-8 projects. Use a responsive grid layout. Use placeholder images for now. Ensure the gallery integrates seamlessly with the dark theme.

nodes.description: Implement the testimonial slider using Splide.js.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T007, implement the testimonial slider using Splide.js. Add placeholder testimonials and style the slider to fit the dark theme. The testimonial slider needs to be horizontally oriented.

nodes.description: Create a contact form with name, email, and message fields.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T008, create a contact form with name, email, and message fields. Style the form to fit the dark theme and make it responsive.

nodes.description: Design the footer with social media icons.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T009, design the footer with social media icons. Link the icons to relevant social media profiles. Style the footer to fit the dark theme.

nodes.description: Apply scroll-in section reveals and CTA hover transitions using Animate.css.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T010, apply scroll-in section reveals and CTA hover transitions using Animate.css. Ensure the animations are subtle and refined, avoiding glows and neons.

nodes.description: Final layout cleanup, responsiveness check, and audit spacing, contrast, and visual balance.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure from T011, perform a final layout cleanup, check responsiveness across different devices, and audit spacing, contrast, and visual balance to ensure a premium photographer look. Replace any placeholder images with images from https://picsum.photos/400/600?grayscale.

nodes.description: Format the HTML to be more readable, and present it in a single file, ready to be deployed.
nodes.agent_prompt: Take the fully coded HTML from T012 and present it in a well-formatted, single HTML file. Ensure proper indentation and readability.
Summarize the code produced and the steps taken.
